h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: You can also try launching yourself to the archer in the window, by jumping and using a midair heavy attack to give yourself a boost over to the window... but do note that he's not alone.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Upper Pagoda (Level 3)'.
The content is as follows:
You can also try launching yourself to the archer in the window, by jumping and using a midair heavy attack to give yourself a boost over to the window... but do note that he's not alone.
